name: Transkriptor
description: Transkriptor provides AI-powered transcription and subtitle generation for audio and video content.
longDescription: Transkriptor is an AI-driven platform designed to transcribe audio and video files into text quickly and accurately, catering to professionals, students, and content creators. It leverages advanced speech recognition technology to convert spoken content into written text in multiple languages, streamlining workflows for meetings, interviews, podcasts, and lectures. The platform also offers subtitle generation, making it valuable for video content creators seeking to enhance accessibility. Transkriptor aims to save users time by automating transcription processes while maintaining high accuracy. Its user-friendly interface allows for easy uploads and editing of transcripts, making it accessible for both individual and enterprise use.
features: Automatically transcribes audio and video files into text with high accuracy using AI-powered speech recognition.
Supports transcription in over 100 languages, enabling global accessibility for diverse users.
Generates subtitles for videos, enhancing content accessibility and engagement for audiences.
Offers an intuitive editor to refine and correct transcripts for improved precision.
Provides fast processing speeds, delivering transcriptions in minutes for efficient workflows.
Allows secure file uploads and exports in multiple formats like TXT, SRT, or Word.
Integrates with platforms like Zoom and Microsoft Teams for seamless meeting transcription.
Includes speaker identification to distinguish between multiple speakers in a single recording.

faqs.question: What types of files can Transkriptor transcribe?
faqs.answer: Transkriptor supports audio and video files in formats like MP3, MP4, WAV, and more, allowing users to upload various media types.

faqs.question: How accurate is Transkriptorâ€™s transcription?
faqs.answer: Transkriptor achieves up to 99% accuracy, depending on audio quality, with an editor available to refine transcripts.

faqs.question: Does Transkriptor offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Transkriptor provides a free trial with limited transcription minutes, allowing users to test its features.

faqs.question: Can Transkriptor transcribe multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Transkriptor supports over 100 languages, making it suitable for multilingual audio and video content.

faqs.question: How long does it take to transcribe a file?
faqs.answer: Transcription typically takes a few minutes, depending on the file length and complexity.

faqs.question: Is Transkriptor suitable for professional use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Transkriptor is designed for professionals, offering features like speaker identification and integrations for meetings.

faqs.question: Can I generate subtitles with Transkriptor?
faqs.answer: Yes, Transkriptor can automatically generate subtitles in SRT format for video content.
